mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_sub (id, sub_set, subscriber_id, `group`, `name`, `tree`, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{subSet}, #{subscriberId}, #{group}, #{name}, #{tree}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT count(msub.id) FROM mm_m_sub msub WHERE msub.sub_set = #{subSet} AND end_time IS NULL

SELECT mext.id, mpub.pub_set, mpub.begin_time, mpub.end_time FROM mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_sub msub, mm_m_ext mext, km_s_sub ssub, km_s_pub spub WHERE mext.id = mpub.ext_id AND ssub.id = #{subId} AND ssub.sub_set = spub.pub_set AND spub.m_sub_id = msub.id AND msub.sub_set = mpub.pub_set AND ssub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY mext.id

SELECT mext.id, mpub.pub_set, mpub.begin_time, mpub.end_time FROM mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_sub msub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE mext.id = mpub.ext_id AND msub.id = #{subId} AND msub.sub_set = mpub.pub_set AND msub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY mext.id

SELECT msub.id, msub.sub_set, msub.subscriber_id, msub.`group`, msub.name, msub.tree, msub.operator_id, msub.begin_time, msub.end_time FROM mm_m_sub msub WHERE msub.id = #{subId} AND msub.end_time IS NULL
